name: Extreme Skiing VR
description: “Extreme skiing VR” is a sports game with multiplayer networking aiming at massive sports amateurs. When playing the game, players need to handle a hand shank to stimulate the ski pole and use skills to challenge theski tracks so as to compete the speed with other players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 8000 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 16000 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1024 MB available space
